image:image.image:title: Fight Club
image:image.image:caption: A ticking-time-bomb insomniac and a slippery soap salesman channel primal male aggression into a shocking new form of therapy.

image:image.image:title: Forrest Gump
image:image.image:caption: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

image:image.image:title: The Dark Knight
image:image.image:caption: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime with the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent.

image:image.image:title: The Godfather
image:image.image:caption: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

image:image.image:title: Schindler's List
image:image.image:caption: The true story of how businessman Oskar Schindler saved over a thousand Jewish lives from the Nazis.

image:image.image:title: Game of Thrones
image:image.image:caption: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

image:image.image:title: Breaking Bad
image:image.image:caption: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine.

image:image.image:title: Arcane
image:image.image:caption: Amid the stark discord of twin cities Piltover and Zaun, two sisters fight on rival sides of a war between magic technologies and clashing convictions.

image:image.image:title: The Sopranos
image:image.image:caption: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life.

image:image.image:title: 12 Angry Men
image:image.image:caption: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

image:image.image:title: Parasite
image:image.image:caption: All unemployed, Ki-taek's family takes peculiar interest in the wealthy Park family, leading them to infiltrate the household.

image:image.image:title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
image:image.image:caption: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man of his reality, crossing his path with five counterparts from other dimensions.
